timeline.body: Instead of `Config.get().getPropagators()` shouldn't you use `propagatorList` parameter?
timeline.bodyText: Instead of Config.get().getPropagators() shouldn't you use propagatorList parameter?
timeline.bodyHTML: Instead of Config.get().getPropagators() shouldn't you use propagatorList parameter?
timeline.author: iNikem

replies.bodyText: Not a strong feeling, so we can update this to be propagatorsList instead.
replies.author: carlosalberto

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
propagators = getSettingFromEnvironment(PROPAGATORS, null);
propagators = getListSettingFromEnvironment(PROPAGATORS, null);
timeline.author: trask

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
@Getter private final String propagators;
@Getter private final List<String> propagators;
timeline.author: trask

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
propagators = properties.getProperty(PROPAGATORS, parent.propagators);
propagators = getPropertyListValue(properties, PROPAGATORS, parent.propagators);
timeline.author: trask

timeline.message: Parse the propagators value from Config.

timeline.body:
null check is not needed, `Config.getListSettingFromEnvironment` always returns non-null
```suggestion
    PropagatorsInitializer.initializePropagators(Config.get().getPropagators());
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
null check is not needed, Config.getListSettingFromEnvironment always returns non-null

Suggested change
if (Config.get().getPropagators() != null) {
PropagatorsInitializer.initializePropagators(Config.get().getPropagators());
}
PropagatorsInitializer.initializePropagators(Config.get().getPropagators());
timeline.author: trask

timeline.body:
null check is not needed, `Config.getListSettingFromEnvironment` always returns non-null

Suggested change
if (propagators == null) {
return;

timeline.message: Do not check for null, but size.
